conversations.body_text: Hi Arhaam Rahaman,  Here is the latest tracking information. Please have a look.

Hi I ordered this 2 weeks ago, i still have not received it and i opted for
express shipping paying extra. So what was the point of paying extra if it
takes this long? You need to refund me my shipping cost for the express.

On Sun, 22 Jun 2025 at 12:58 PM, service@simsonn.com

Hi Arhaam Rahaman,     Your order was shipped in two separate packages. Below is the latest tracking information. We sincerely apologize for the delay, which was caused by a delay in component supply from the VAM supplier.
